defaultValue.value:
{
  advanceButtonText: '',
  checkpoints: {
    advanceButtonText: '',
    body: '',
    dismissButtonText: '',
    endButtonText: '',
    onAdvance: () => {},
    onDismiss: () => {},
    placement: 'top',
    title: '',
    showDismissButton: undefined,
  },
  dismissButtonText: '',
  endButtonText: '',
  onDismiss: () => {},
  onEnd: () => {},
  onEscape: () => {},
  startingIndex: 0,
}

advanceButtonText.name: node
advanceButtonText.description: The text displayed on all buttons used to advance the tour.

checkpoints.name: arrayOf

advanceButtonText.name: node
advanceButtonText.description:
The text displayed on the button used to advance the tour for the given Checkpoint
(overrides the* `advanceButtonText` defined in the parent tour object).

body.name: node
body.description: The text displayed in the body of the Checkpoint

dismissButtonText.name: node
dismissButtonText.description:
The text displayed on the button used to dismiss the tour for the given Checkpoint
(overrides the `dismissButtonText` defined in the parent tour object).

endButtonText.name: node
endButtonText.description:
The text displayed on the button used to end the tour for the given Checkpoint
(overrides the `endButtonText` defined in the parent tour object).

onAdvance.name: func
onAdvance.description:
A function that runs when triggering the `onClick` event of the advance
button for the given Checkpoint.

onDismiss.name: func
onDismiss.description:
A function that runs when triggering the `onClick` event of the dismiss
button for the given Checkpoint (overrides the `onDismiss` function defined in the parent tour object).

onEnd.name: func
onEnd.description:
A function that runs when triggering the `onClick` event of the advance
button if the given Checkpoint is the only or last Checkpoint in a tour.

placement.name: enum
placement.description: A string that dictates the alignment of the Checkpoint around its target.

target.name: string
target.description: The CSS selector for the Checkpoint's desired target.

title.name: node
title.description: The text displayed in the title of the Checkpoint

showDismissButton.name: bool
showDismissButton.description: Enforces visibility of the dismiss button under all circumstances

checkpoints.description: An array comprised of checkpoint objects supporting the following values:

dismissButtonText.name: node
dismissButtonText.description: The text displayed on the button used to dismiss the tour.

enabled.name: bool
enabled.description: Whether the tour is enabled. If there are multiple tours defined, only one should be enabled at a time.

endButtonText.name: node
endButtonText.description: The text displayed on the button used to end the tour.

onDismiss.name: func
onDismiss.description: A function that runs when triggering the `onClick` event of the dismiss button.

onEnd.name: func
onEnd.description: A function that runs when triggering the `onClick` event of the end button.

onEscape.name: func
onEscape.description: A function that runs when pressing the Escape key.

startingIndex.name: number
startingIndex.description: The index of the desired `Checkpoint` to render when the tour starts.
